DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of SPD503 in subjects with ADHD when co-administered with psychostimulants in children and adolescents aged 6-17 years with a diagnosis of ADHD with a sub-optimal, partial response to stimulants.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of SPD503 in Combination With Psychostimulants
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects with ADHD currently taking a stable dose of psychostimulant for at least 4 weeks Aged 617 years with a suboptimal Partial response to stimulants Subjects must be < 95th percentile for BMI with weight >= 55lbs and <= 176lbs
